TopicTitle: Vanilla Aircraft Endurance Record for DARPA

Articles.Content:
A small company in Virginia is trying to fly a heavy-fueled UAV for ten days.  Aerospace innovation is literally out most of our back doors, and much more accessible to interested undergraduate students and high schoolers than people think.  Check out this link from DARPA!

http://www.darpa.mil/news-events/2017-01-04

Edited January 7, 2017 by Jonfliesgoats
